content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James Smith, it's great to meet you. Thank you for considering our apartment. Our rental price is negotiable based on the length of the lease and the condition of the apartment. May I know how long you are looking to rent the apartment for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a minimum of 1 year and a maximum of 3 years. What is your rental price for those terms?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: For a 1-year lease, our rental price is €600 per month. However, for a 2-year lease, we can offer a discount of €50 per month, bringing the total to €550 per month. If you sign for a 3-year lease, we can offer an additional discount of €25 per month, bringing the total to €525 per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in the 2-year lease. Can I definitely get the discount?

Also, do you require any additional fees or deposits?

Finally, when can I move in?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

I agree to the price of €550 per month for a 2-year lease.

TERMINATE
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for choosing our apartment, James. We are happy to offer you the discount for the 2-year lease. We do require a security deposit of €500 and a move-in fee of €100. The move-in date is flexible, but we would prefer it to be within the next month. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
